title_teim: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Line Cut Clean Reel 200
title_ssm: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Line Cut Clean Reel 200
title_si: The sixteenth annual induction ceremony. 2001. Line Cut Clean Reel 200
summary_teim: The 2001 Rock Hall induction continues with the inductions of Solomon Burke, Steely Dan, Queen and Paul Simon.
summary_ssm: The 2001 Rock Hall induction continues with the inductions of Solomon Burke, Steely Dan, Queen and Paul Simon.
contents_teim: Mary J. Blige inducts Solomon Burke [repeated from previous reel] - Burke speaks and accepts award - Burke performs Don’t you feel like crying – Moby inducts Steely Dan - Walter Becker and Donald Fagen speak and accept the award – Steely Dan performs Black friday – Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins, of Foo Fighters, inducts Queen – Roger Taylor and Brian May speak ; Jer Bulsara, mother of Freddie Mercury, accepts award on behalf of Mercury - Paul Simon performs Still crazy after all these years ; Graceland – Marc Anthony inducts Paul Simon.
contents_ssm: Mary J. Blige inducts Solomon Burke [repeated from previous reel] - Burke speaks and accepts award - Burke performs Don’t you feel like crying – Moby inducts Steely Dan - Walter Becker and Donald Fagen speak and accept the award – Steely Dan performs Black friday – Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins, of Foo Fighters, inducts Queen – Roger Taylor and Brian May speak ; Jer Bulsara, mother of Freddie Mercury, accepts award on behalf of Mercury - Paul Simon performs Still crazy after all these years ; Graceland – Marc Anthony inducts Paul Simon.
series_teim: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
series_ssm: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)

abstract_ssm: Mary J. Blige inducts Solomon Burke -- Solomon Burke accepts his award -- Don't You Feel Like Crying (Solomon Burke) -- Moby inducts Steely Dan -- Video montage of Steely Dan -- Walter Becker and Donald Fagen of Steely Dan accept their award -- Black Friday (Black Friday with Brian May) -- Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins, of Foo Fighters, inducts Queen -- Video montage of Queen -- Roger Taylor and Brian May accept their awards -- Freddie Mercury's mother, Jer Bulsara, accepts award on behalf of Mercury -- Still Crazy after All These Years (Paul Simon) -- Graceland (Paul Simon) -- Marc Anthony inducts Paul Simon -- Video montage of Paul Simon
